head-description: Bludit is free and open-source. If you find it valuable and want to support its development, please consider contributing on Patreon. As a token of our gratitude, supporters are rewarded with Bludit PRO.
description-paragraph1: Bludit is free and open-source. If you find it valuable and want to support its development, please consider contributing on Patreon. As a token of our gratitude, supporters are rewarded with Bludit PRO.
description-paragraph2: If you prefer, you can also make a one-time donation to buy us a coffee or beer. Every contribution helps us continue to improve Bludit and provide the best possible experience for our users.
become-a-backer-or-sponsor: Become a Backer or Sponsor at Patreon and get Bludit PRO.
are-you-happy-with-bludit: Are you happy with Bludit? You can buy me a coffee or a beer, you can do it through PayPal or BTC.
